thread.section_title: Shangri-La's China World Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Impressive!!
thread.title_full: Impressive!! - Review of Shangri-La's China World Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Ramez A
title: Impressive!!
text:
I am presently staying at this hotel on behalf of my airline .
Location is good with indoor access to the China World Shopping Mall and Subway Stations.Just few mins walk from the famous "Silk Market" and 'The Place'.
Room is spacious and very comfortable have no complains what so ever.
Gym is excellent and open round the clock.
Hotel lobby is amazing and gives a feeling of immense grandeur.
Over all an amazing hotel and would love to stay very often
